embed 1.description:
> __ __✿__ __❀__ __ **Please open a ticket to**...
      ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧
> ・Report a user/server/blacklist
> ・Report a copycat
> ・Claim booster perks
> ・Claim GW & event prizes
> ・Adresss a concern
> ・Ask a question in private
      ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧
embed 1.title: ♡﹒﹒Open a Ticket! ✿❀

embed 2.description:
> __ __✿__ __❀__ __ Tysm for opening a ticket!
      ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧
> ♡﹒﹒If you're here for something specific, please type the corresponding command listed below for more info. If you just want to ask a question or address a concern, don't worry about typing a command; let us know what's on your mind! ✿❀
      ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧
> ・*`.perks` - claim booster perks*
> ・*`.claim` - claim event prizes*
> ・*`.report` - report an issue*
      ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴ ‧  ╴‧  ╴‧  ╴‧

tickets.cooldown message: ♡﹒﹒**Psst!** Please slow down a bit; you can only apply for being a **Verified Artist** once every __2 weeks__.
